summary: A selection of 30 cannibal-themed meals. I created this for my own play-style...a character that practices cannibalism for survival...but is not a follower of Namira. Those who find using Namira's Ring to be a chore may find this mod useful.
descriptionHtml:
Each dish regenerates 10 points of Health for 300 second and heals 10 points of Health. Some dishes will
heal 10 points of Stamina as well. If RND and the RND-Universal Compatibility Patch are installed each dish will provide a meal and
still regenerate health, which is the setup I use.

Ash Yam Meat Pie
Berry Stuffed Roast
Bone Meal and Berry Pudding
Bone Meal Cheese Pie
Bone Meal Mushroom Soup
Bone Meal Pudding
Bone Meal Soup
Cannibal Ashland Stew
Cannibal Fondue
Cannibal Root Stew
Cannibal Salad
Cannibal Soup
Cannibal Stew
Cheese Stuffed Heart
Cheese Stuffed Roast
HCT Sandwich
Heart and Egg Scramble
Heart and Fish Pie
Heart and Mushroom Pie
Herb Stuffed Heart
Human and Chips
Human and Veggie Stew
Human Rib Meat
Mashed Hearts
Midnight Snack
Minced Meat Pie
Mushroom Stuffed Roast
Spicy Drumstick
Spicy Gourd and Human Stew
Stuffed Gourd

The mod requires both Hearthfire and Dragonborn.

This mod works very well with the following:

Corpse Harvesting Gear
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80651]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80651[/url]

Realistic Needs and Diseases All-In-Onefor USLEEP
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75876]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75876[/url]

RND - Universal Compatibility Patch
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60270]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60270[/url]

You Hunger
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49421]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49421[/url]
author: redmoon626
